effects.name: Flame embodiment
effects.description: Gives additional health, speed boost, regeneration and fire resistance, additionally reducing fire ticks to zero.

effects.name: Frost embodiment
effects.description: Gives additional health, speed boost and regeneration, also reducing frozen ticks to zero.

effects.name: Vital energy overflow
effects.description: Gives a lot of additional hearts, speed boost, and ultra fast regeneration.

effects.name: Amorphousness
effects.description: You can fly) As in creative. But this effect gives you feather falling upon ending, so you can diving to the clouds without worries. No fall damage, as in creative, and fast regeneration.
